short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your daily read articles to the specified repo at Github.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension can log your read web pages to README.md of the selected repo on Github.

You can clearly see your reading logs. Using as a collection or share your logs with friends.

You are what you read!

This extension will not upload your Github account token or anything else. 
Please review it in Github: https://github.com/chafel/iRead .
Your star encourage me keep update this extension, any pull request for adding features or feedback is welcome.

Process:
1. Generate a token with your Github account.
2. [Optional] Create a new repo for saving read logs.
3. Copy token to this extension and click check.
4. Select a repo (created in the step 2 or existing one) and  finish setting.
5. Click the extension icon in any page your want to save.
